body_html:
If a show-heartbeat recipe has the repeat option set to "Show prompt until the user interacts with it, then never again", and the user sees a prompt, doesn't interact with it, and then closes and opens Firefox again within 24 hours, the user does not see the prompt because the check for avoiding showing a heartbeat prompt more than once every 24 hours happens first.

What QA (and I) expected was that the repeat option would supersede the 24-hour option and would re-show on reboot.

@MattGrimes @gregglind What is your preferred behavior for this configuration?
title: "Show prompt until user interaction" and the 24-hour cutoff for show-heartbeat conflict
